channel.title: [Deathlypvpz] Help with webclient/vote/donate!
channel.description: Ok, i'm useing Deathlypvpz as a base, and it has a vote system and donate system, i wanna know, 3 things. 1. How do i give people voteing points for voteing? Like how do i link it to the site, etc... 2. How do i give people donator for donateing! 3. How do i make it a webclient with autocache downloader, is the an optimal tutorial to follow?

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Help with webclient/vote/donate!
item.dc:creator: @Danielson183 Danielson183
item.description:
@Danielson183 wrote:

Ok, i’m useing Deathlypvpz as a base, and it has a vote system and donate system, i wanna know, 3 things.

  1. How do i give people voteing points for voteing? Like how do i link it to the site, etc…
  2. How do i give people donator for donateing!
  3. How do i make it a webclient with autocache downloader, is the an optimal tutorial to follow?

Read full topic
